history.proof: intros x y. split. - intros H. split. + strivial use: Rabs_def2. + strivial use: Rabs_def2. - intros [H1 H2]. srun best use: Rabs_def1.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : R H : Rabs x < y Unable to unify "x" with "- y".
In environment x, y : R H : Rabs x < y Unable to unify "Rabs x < y" with "- y <= Rabs x".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
In environment x, y : R H : Rabs x < y Unable to unify "Rabs x < y" with "x < y".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.
In environment x, y : R H1 : - y < x H2 : x < y Unable to unify "- y < x" with "Rabs x < y".
In environment x, y : R H1 : - y < x H2 : x < y Unable to unify "x < y" with "Rabs x < y".

original: intros x y. split. - intros H. split. + apply (Rle_lt_trans _ (Rabs x) _). apply RRle_abs. apply H. + apply H. - intros [H1 H2]. apply (Rle_lt_trans _ y _). apply Rlt_le. apply H1. apply H2.
